Package com.redis.app.redis_app_studio.shared

Class SCDSRequest

java.lang.Object
com.redis.app.redis_app_studio.shared.SCDSRequest
public class SCDSRequest extends Object
Collection of utility methods that support transformation of SmartClient Data Source Requests into Redis Foundational objects. Note: These classes are utilized before a Servlet method has established an Application Context, so any log messages will be redirected to the containers stdout message stream (e.g. "catalina.out").
Since:
1.0
Author:
Al Cole
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • setDebugFlag

      public void setDebugFlag(boolean anIsEnabled)

    • convertDSCriteria

      public com.redis.foundation.ds.DSCriteria convertDSCriteria(com.isomorphic.datasource.DSRequest aDSRequest) throws Exception
      The SmartClient simple criteria is just a map of name/value pairs without any operators. However, this method has logic that will look for a JSON representation of an AdvancedCriteria object and (if found) will transform it into a individual DSCriterion objects. This method also supports field names with the convention of "FieldName:Data.Operator" and parsers into corresponding DSCriterion objects.
      Parameters:
      aDSRequest - SmartClient data source request instance
      Returns:
      Data source criteria instance
      Throws:
      Exception - Simple criteria parsing error

    • convertDGCriteria

      public com.redis.foundation.ds.DGCriteria convertDGCriteria(com.isomorphic.datasource.DSRequest aDSRequest) throws Exception
      The SmartClient simple criteria is just a map of name/value pairs without any operators. However, this method has logic that will look for a JSON representation of an AdvancedCriteria object and (if found) will transform it into a individual DGCriterion objects. This method also supports field names with the convention of "FieldName:Data.Operator" and parsers into corresponding DSCriterion objects.
      Parameters:
      aDSRequest - SmartClient data source request instance
      Returns:
      Data source criteria instance
      Throws:
      Exception - Simple criteria parsing error

    • convertDocument

      public com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc convertDocument(Map aMap, com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc aSchemaDoc)
      Converts the SmartClient map of field/value pairs into a DataDoc instance derived from the schema document parameter.
      Parameters:
      aMap - Name/Value map
      aSchemaDoc - Schema data document instance
      Returns:
      Data document instance representing the original Map

    • convertDSCriteria

      public com.redis.foundation.ds.DSCriteria convertDSCriteria(Map aCriteria)
      This SmartClient simple criteria is just a map of name/value pairs without any operators. This method creates a DSCriteria based on the Map by assuming each entry should be converted as DSCriterion(name, Data.Operator.EQUAL, value)
      Parameters:
      aCriteria - Name/Value map
      Returns:
      Data source criteria instance
